name: Zoop To The Future! - A Time Traveling Point-N-Click Adventure for PC/Linux/Mac/iPad!
blurb: A hilarious point-n-click adventure game that takes Prickley Pete, a ghost, and his two best friends to multiple times periods and locales!

rewards.reward: Prickley Pete will make you a personalized "Thank You!" video + Exclusive, backer only updates, images, and videos!

A copy of "Zoop To The Future!" on PC/Linux/Mac (iPad Coming Soon!) + "Executive Producer" Credit in the game + Prickley Pete will make you a personalized "Thank You!" video + A "Zoop To The Future!" Floppy Disk filled with 1.44 MB of Prickley Pete Goodness!  + Exclusive, backer only updates, images, and videos!
